home_p1: Welcome to the world of super car wash, where your car always receives special attention and professional care! with us, itâ€™s more than just a car washâ€”premium services ensure your vehicle shines like a brand-new car. book an appointment quickly and easily, choose from our various washing packages, and experience the true meaning of automotive luxury!

our_previous_jobs: Our Previous Work â€” From Ideas to Reality
custom_and_mass_produced_structures: Custom and mass-produced metal structures with precise, clean workmanship. Our team works with modern machinery and short deadlines.
steel_stainless_aluminium_welding: Steel, stainless steel and aluminium welding (MIG/MAG, GTAW/TIG)
on_site_installation_and_survey: On-site installation and survey â€“ with flexible travel

mobile_team: Our mobile team undertakes on-site work with quick deployment, even on weekends.
every_project_story: Every project is a story. Someone imagined it, and we brought it to life. From the initial idea, through careful planning, precise manufacturing, and meticulous installation, the final result was exactly as the client envisioned â€“ or even better.
every_project_challenge: Whether itâ€™s a modern gate, an elegant railing, a custom metal structure, or an entire hall frame, every project is a new challenge for us, one we complete with passion and expertise. Take a look at our selection and see how we transform ideas into lasting, high-quality creations.
about_us_intro: Since 2021, as a family-owned business, KLtechnik Ltd. has built every project on reliability, expertise, and quality. While the company is officially young, our professional experience spans over a decade. During this time, we have completed countless unique projects: creating impressive gates, stylish railings, precisely crafted metal structures, and major industrial steel constructions.
about_us_cooperation: Working closely with our clients, we oversee projects from design to completion, ensuring the final result not only meets but exceeds expectations. For us, every commission is a new opportunity to turn creative ideas into tangible, durable, and aesthetically pleasing realities.
about_us_proud_goal: We are proud to work not only in Hungary but also in Austria and Germany. Our goal is simple: to deliver durable, beautiful, and precise work â€“ on time.
wide_range_solutions: Wide-ranging solutions from a single source
hall_frames_fences: Design, production, and installation of hall frames, railings, and fence elements.
austria_germany_projects: Systems installed in 3 cities in Austria, series production for Germany.
gates_railings_accessories: Gates, railings, custom accessories â€“ from concept to installation.
spike_tube_bending_welding: Spike tube bending and high-quality welding from steel, stainless steel, and aluminum materials.
industrial_welding_machines: Industrial welding machines, mandrel tube benders, and precision equipment support our work. Production is always accompanied by controlled processes and documented quality assurance.
materials: Materials: carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminium, acid-resistant
we_strive_for_perfection: We always strive for perfection â€“ no matter the job.
